scripts.deploy: rm -rf build && gulp build && rsync -rvc dist/ push.org.ru:www/files/vozim.by/
scripts.deploy2: rm -rf build && gulp build && rsync -rvc dist/ root@sandbox.hcbogdan.com:/var/www/sandbox/data/www/vozimby.hcbogdan.com
scripts.push-build: gulp build && git checkout build && git fetch && git reset --hard origin/build && cp -r dist/* . && git add --all && git commit -m "`date "+%Y-%m-%d %H:%m"`" && git push && git checkout master
